creator: DribbleCorp
descriptionHtml:
So you think you know hoops do you? Well then prove it!

Dribble features two different game modes to test your basketball knowledge, each with their own unique twist! These game modes are: Daily Dribble and Speed Dribble.

🏀 Daily Dribble 🏀
Daily Dribble tasks you with connecting two NBA players by linking together up to six shared teammates. Beginning with the starting player, you’ll need to name one of their teammates. If this player has played with the ending player, you win! If not, you now get to name a teammate of the player you just guessed to ultimately link your way to the ending player.

The Daily game is the same game for each and every Dribble player around the world, so share your winning games to showcase your NBA basketball knowledge and flex on your friends!

⌚ Speed Dribble ⌚
Speed Dribble is a unique twist on Daily Dribble. It tasks you with connecting two NBA players while you race against a 24-second shot clock! In Speed Dribble there is no limit to the number of NBA players you can link together to connect the starting and ending players! Naming a valid teammate of the current player resets the shot clock to 24 seconds, however an incorrect guess removes 8 seconds!

In SpeedDribble, you’ll build up a streak as you successfully connect NBA players – see how long of a streak you can build! You can play unlimited Speed Dribble so long as you keep winning! If you lose, you’ll have to spend one of your three daily lives to play again.

📈 Career Statistics 📈
Just like basketball players, you’ll have your own career stats! Want to see how many guesses it takes you to beat the Daily Dribble, or want to know your guess accuracy in Shot Clock Dribble? Say less - simply tap the stats button in either game mode.

👤 Personal Account 👤
Dribble also features the ability to create an account! Create a Dribble account and save your career stats across as many devices as you like. No more losing your basketball trivia stats when you get a new phone!

What are you waiting for, get out there and Dribble like the basketball pros!
descriptionShort: A basketball trivia game that tests your player knowledge!
title: Dribble Game Trivia

title:

1.3.4

creator: DribbleCorp
descriptionHtml:
Prove your basketball knowledge by connecting NBA players through their teammates in a variety of fun and challenging trivia games!

Dribble features three different game modes to test your basketball knowledge, each with their own unique twist! These game modes are: Classic Dribble, Griddy and Swipeball.

1. Classic Dribble
Classic Dribble gives you daily puzzles where you connect two NBA players by linking together up to six shared teammates. Beginning with the starting player, you’ll need to name one of their teammates. If this player has played with the ending player, you win! If not, you now get to name a teammate of the player you just guessed to ultimately link your way to the ending player.

The Daily game is the same game for each and every Dribble player around the world, so share your winning games to showcase your NBA basketball knowledge and flex on your friends!

2. Griddy
Griddy is our unique twist on daily grid trivia games you may be familiar with from Immaculate Grid or Crossover Grid! Fill up the grid with players who have played together to get as many shared seasons and fully connected squares as possible!

3. Swipeball
Swipeball is our newest rapid-fire game mode where you guess if a player’s stats are over or under a threshold in an addicting Tinder-style card swiping interface! You’re going to have to stay up to date on NBA stats because Swipeball updates with every game played this season!

What are you waiting for, get out there and Dribble like the basketball pros!
descriptionShort: A basketball trivia game that tests your player knowledge!
title:
Dribble Game Trivia
1.6.3

Dribble features three different game modes to test your basketball knowledge, each with their own unique twist! These game modes are: Classic Dribble, Griddy and Swipeball.

3. Swipeball
Swipeball is our newest rapid-fire game mode where you guess if a player’s stats are over or under a threshold in an addicting Tinder-style card swiping interface! You’re going to have to stay up to date on NBA stats because Swipeball updates with every game played this season!

4. Faceball
Faceball is a hilarious and challenging game mode where you're shown a player headshot that is a combination of 4 separate players! Can you guess who the 4 fused players are?

What are you waiting for, get out there and Dribble like the basketball pros!
descriptionShort: Griddy, Swipeball, Faceball and more basketball trivia games!
title:
Dribble Hoops Sports Trivia
1.8.4
